typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer,
		indicator as string,
		daily_count as short,
		date as date,
		rate_14_day as double,
		source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CasesAndDeathsSource
CasesAndDeathsSource filter(continent=="Europe") ~> FilterEuropeOnly
